title: Canada - average working hours per week 2019
yAxis: Number of employed person in thousands
summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Average usual weekly hours, and Number of employed person in thousands in each Average usual weekly hours on the y axis.

The maximum Number of employed person in thousands 7282.5 is found at Average usual weekly hours 40 hours and the minimum is found at 41 to 49 hours where Number of employed person in thousands is 1044.2.
The difference of Number of employed person in thousands between the highest and lowest Average usual weekly hours is 6238.3.
